content: 8 9 or 1 5 less than desired length pick up and k 1 in each of the next 0 2 0 2 slipped sts on the edge of the heel toe round 1 set up k 32 36 40 44 sts pm k to end pm to indicate top of heel flap then pick up and knit 1 round 2 decrease k1 sks k until 3 sts before m st in each of the next 10 11 12 13 sl sts along the k2tog k1 sm twice 4 sts decreased second edge of the heel flap pm to indicate the bottom of the gusset pick up and knit 1 in each of the round 3 k all sts around slipping markers when you remaining 6 5 8 7 slipped sts on the edge of the heel come to them flap pm to indicate bottom of heel flap k to the new there are now 60 68 76 84 sts on the needles beginning of the round m distribute sts evenly across the repeat rnds 2-3 an additional 6 7 8 9 times and needles if needed 88 98 108 118 sts 36 40 44 48 sts remain on the needles join color b and change to larger needles now you will begin decreasing every round repeat round 2 an additional five times 16 20 24 28 sts gusset rnds work gusset chart 1 to first m work chart b to 2nd m work gusset chart 2 to 3rd m work cut the yarn leaving a 12-inch tail graft the remaining chart b to end sts together using the kitchener stitch weave in ends note that on the gusset charts 1&2 size 1 will and block start/end at the red border 2 at the green 3 at the blue and 4 works the full chart sock 2 work instructions for sock 1 swapping colors a and b work all gusset rounds in this fashion until 1 st remains so anytime the instructions call for color a work color on each gusset on the next round work chart b b and if they call for color b work color a replace around removing the gusset markers and knitting the chart a with chart b and chart c with chart d last gusset st together with one of the adjacent chart b sts 64 72 80 88 sts continue to foot section #lattesandllamas #geekalong #shiftersocks |for personal use only | © lattes & llamas | page 6 leg charts chart a sock 1 chart b sock 2 #lattesandllamas
